name: Space Bowling
description:
We're bowlers on the moon!
We carry our own shoes!
But there ain't no air, so we bowl ten spares and sing our bowling tune!

Launch Jupiter at pins down a bowling alley in space!
A simple bowling game with a space theme, see how high you can score!

The game can be played in the browser, and on Windows, Android, iPhone and iPad devices. See links to Space Bowling on the Google Play store and Apple App store further down the page.

The default resolution for the game is 1600x900 (16:9), but it is playable in any of the resolutions offered when starting the Windows version of the game.
